title: Ornn's Login Theme
body: Lots of satisfying clangs in it.

replies.body: I love how it calls back to the teaser song instead of making a new tune; it feels familiar to me, even though Ornn hasn't existed that long, which makes me like it even more. This is the song that plays when the heroes finally enter the mountain and descend into the forge: the clang of the hammer, the humming of Ornn. It's awe-inspiring.
It makes me so happy that you heard the connection to, "The Path to Hearth-Home"! My inner music nerd was hoping that'd be the case :)
